g.text: DATABASE ENGINEERING ¬∑ LEGACY MIGRATION ¬∑ CLOUD-NATIVE ARCHITECTURE
dynamic SQL y optimizaci√≥n de queries complejas
de schema y validaci√≥n de integridad referencial
CI/CD pipelines y deployment en Kubernetes

SELECT * FROM legacy_schema.orders WHERE status='PENDING' ¬∑ EXECUTE pkg_migration.run_batch(p_id=>42) ¬∑ COMMIT ¬∑ flyway migrate -url=jdbc:oracle:thin:@host:1521:ORCL ¬∑ kubectl rollout status deploy/api-service ¬∑ ALTER SESSION SET NLS_DATE_FORMAT='YYYY-MM-DD' ¬∑ dbms_output.put_line('Migrated: '||v_count) ¬∑

kubectl apply -f migration-job.yaml ¬∑ spring.datasource.url=jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:1521:ORCL ¬∑ docker build -t api-service:4.0.0 ¬∑ git push origin main ‚Üí CI pipeline triggered ¬∑ 14 tests passed ¬∑
DATABASE ENGINEERING ¬∑ PL/SQL ¬∑ LEGACY MIGRATION ¬∑ CLOUD-NATIVE MODERNIZATION
